description: Created for a game development class project, Bibbit's Quest was inspired by party games based off of a series of mini games. Bibbit's Quests follows a frog venturing through different levels consisting of different genres of games.
Beep Bop Bedop Bop is a platformer game working with the beat of the music. Each platform spawns on the mouse location to the beat of the music.

TraX-Bot is a Discord bot made entirely to fulfill the requests of my friends. It is a multipurpose bot but its original purpose was to be a Reddit bot. Using the PRAW library, TraX-Bot can send random posts from any subreddit. Filtering NSFW content to only send to channels marked as NSFW.
